codeanticode.gltexture
Class GLSLShader

java.lang.Object
  codeanticode.gltexture.GLSLShader

public class GLSLShader
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates a glsl shader. Based in the code by JohnG (http://www.hardcorepawn.com/)
